search.query: |tstats dc(resource.data.id) as Count where `gcp_index` (sourcetype="google:gcp:assets" OR sourcetype=google:gcp:compute:instance) asset_type=compute.googleapis.com/Instance $text_search$ by _time, name, resource.data.name, resource.data.status, resource.data.id, resource.data.machineType, update_time | eval projectid=replace(name,"\S+projects\/(\S+)\/zones\S+","\1") |eval zone=replace(name,"\S+zones\/(\S+)\/instances\S+","\1")
search resource.data.status="Running" projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |stats dc(resource.data.id) as count
search resource.data.status="TERMINATED" projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) |stats dc(resource.data.id) as count
|stats count by projectid |rename projectid as Project_ID
search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) | stats count by zone

search.query: search resource.data.status="Running" projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) | stats count by resource.data.id, resource.data.machineType | rename resource.data.machineType as mType | eval Type=replace(mType,"^\S+machineTypes\/(\S+)","\1") | stats count by Type

search.query: search resource.data.status="Running" projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) | timechart count by zone

search projectid IN ($project_id_tok$) zone IN ($zone_tok$) | stats count by resource.data.id, name, projectid, zone, resource.data.status, resource.data.machineType, update_time | rename resource.data.machineType as mType resource.data.id as "Instance ID"| eval Type=replace(mType,"^\S+machineTypes\/(\S+)","\1") | eval Name=replace(name,"^\S+instances\/(\S+)","\1") |table "Instance ID" , Name, projectid, zone, resource.data.status, Type, update_time |rename projectid as ProjectID, resource.data.status as "Last Known Status" update_time as "Last Update"
